content: Now that you've dropped down from the Upper Hollow using one of the two paths to reach the Shrine below, you'll find yourself in the large middle portion of the Hollow. Similar to the Upper Hollow, there's a few diverging paths -- some that lead to optional areas and bosses, and some that reconnect back to the main path down to the Lower Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Verdure Bridge'.
The content is as follows:
Now that you've dropped down from the Upper Hollow using one of the two paths to reach the Shrine below, you'll find yourself in the large middle portion of the Hollow. Similar to the Upper Hollow, there's a few diverging paths -- some that lead to optional areas and bosses, and some that reconnect back to the main path down to the Lower Hollow.
